values: 醉的；醉酒的；喝醉的；沉醉的；陶醉的；飘飘然；醉心于…的；沉迷于…的；因…而欣喜若狂的
醉酒者；酒鬼；酗酒者；醉汉
喝；饮；喝酒；酗酒；（drink 的过去分词）

word_group.brief_definition: 醉酒驾驶, 醉驾, 酒驾

bilingual.target: 我从来没有见过他酒醉的样子。

bilingual.source: I don't like the feeling of being drunk.
I have never seen him totally drunk before.
bilingual.target: 我从未见过他酩酊大醉的样子。

bilingual.source: He couldn't stand steadily because he was drunk.
The bartender refused to inebriate the already drunk customer.
bilingual.target: 酒保拒绝使醉酒已经喝醉的顾客。

bilingual.source: But a certain man who was very drunk was seen to reel into Mr. Twain's hotel last night.
bilingual.target: 但昨晚有人看见一个喝得酩酊大醉的人走进了吐温先生的旅馆。
喝太多的酒会使人醉的。

bilingual.source: What shall we do with the drunk sailor?
bilingual.target: 我们拿这个喝醉的水手怎么办?。

list.abstract: drunk（英[drʌŋk]，美[drʌŋk]），英语单词，作形容词为醉的；喝醉的；陶醉于…中的。作名词为醉汉；醉酒者；酒鬼。短语搭配有blind drunk（烂醉如泥的）。例句为“They were too drunk to notice.（他们醉得太厉害，注意不到。）” drunk相关近义词有loaded、buffy，相关反义词有sober。
《Drunk》是徐梦圆演唱的一首歌曲，由J Cason作词，徐梦圆、嘿人李逵Noisemakers作曲，于2018年12月9日发行。

yingyinNormal.en: The hedge fund Vonerich. Another DUI. Keeping the world safe for drunk CEOs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 弗尼里奇对冲基金，又一个酒驾。为喝醉的CEO保驾护航。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. Later, we'll check out the minibar? I'll show you how Godzilla gets drunk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等一下，我们看看迷你酒柜有什么东西？我让你见识下哥斯拉是怎么喝醉的。

yingyinNormal.en: Gosh, Raj, do you think you'll ever be able to talk in front of me without being drunk?
yingyinNormal.zh: 天呐，拉杰，你如果不喝醉的话是不是永远都不能在我面前说话？

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, I mean I don't know if you noticed, but he had a lot to drink, and you know how he gets when he's drunk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，我不知道你是否注意到，他喝了很多酒，他酒醉的模样你也见识过。

yingyinNormal.en: When I was in Greenland, they do karaoke there and I had to get on this helicopter, with a very drunk pilot. And I started to imagine you singing Major Tom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当我在格陵兰岛，他们有卡拉OK，和我不得不与一个喝的非常醉的直升机飞行员。我开始想像你在唱汤姆中校。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know. I'm a little drunk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我真的不知道，我喝多了。

yingyinNormal.en: What? He was drunk. I would hope so.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？他喝醉了。但愿如此。

yingyinNormal.en: No. You get as sloppy drunk as you want to.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有啊，你爱怎么乱喝就怎么喝。

yingyinNormal.en: Coming! Damn you, you rat bastard. Are you drunk?
yingyinNormal.zh: 来了！你个该死的混蛋！你醉啦？

yingyinNormal.en: Leonard. She might be drunk. All she had was chips.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱纳德，她可能喝醉了。毕竟她就吃了点薯片。

yingyinNormal.en: I've never been drunk and did something I regretted.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我从没喝醉过，也没做过让自己后悔的事情。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't think you'll ever get my parents that drunk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你应该不能把他们灌到那么醉。

yingyinNormal.en: Since when does drunk and disorderly get this much attention?
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么时候起你这么关注醉酒闹事了？

yingyinNormal.en: Are you drunk? No. I'm lying. I am so drunk. Oh, God.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你喝醉了？才没有呢，骗你的，我醉醺醺的。天哪。

yingyinNormal.en: Drunk Williamsburg guys.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些威廉斯堡的醉鬼们。

yingyinNormal.en: They let you get married when you're drunk. Most people who get married in Vegas are drunk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然可能，在拉斯维加斯结婚的人，通常都醉了。

yingyinNormal.en: Basically, Rachel and I were in Vegas and we got drunk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 基本上，瑞秋和我在拉斯维加斯，我们喝醉了…

yingyinNormal.en: What about it? You know what we did, when we were drunk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么了？你知道我们喝醉以后做的那些事。

yingyinNormal.en: My dad was a sloppy drunk. I said I'd never be like him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我父亲是个邋遢的醉汉，我曾说过永远都不会像他一样。

yingyinNormal.en: Galahad is dead. Hence, we have just drunk a toast to him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 加拉哈德死了，因此，我们刚为他举杯致敬。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 醉汉; 酒鬼; 酗酒者

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 醉的；喝醉的；陶醉于…中的；因…而兴奋不已的

word_family.mean: v. 喝；饮；喝酒；酗酒；把…喝完；全神贯注地看；被强烈地吸引住；陶醉于；吸收；喝起来有某种滋味

sense_info_list.zh: 醉汉; 酒鬼; 酗酒者

examination_example.sentence: A toothy grin lacked class: <highlight>drunks</highlight>, tramps, and music hall performers might gurn and grin with a smile as wide as Lewis Carroll's gum-exposing Cheshire Cat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 露齿一笑有失身份：酒鬼、流浪汉和音乐厅里的戏子也许会像路易斯·卡罗尔笔下露着牙龈嬉笑的柴郡猫那般扮着鬼脸、露齿大笑。

sense_info_list.en: unable to speak or act in the usual way because of having had too much alcohol

word_usage.usage: drunk的基本意思是“喝醉的”，可引申指为美好的事物而“陶醉”。

examination_example.sentence: "I often invited them to drink alcohol. Once they were <highlight>drunk</highlight>, they began to talk a lot," Wang said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 王说：“我经常邀请他们喝酒。一旦他们喝醉了，他们就开始说很多话。”

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 醉的；喝醉的；陶醉于…中的；因…而兴奋不已的

examination_example.sentence: But a certain man who was very <highlight>drunk</highlight> was seen to reel into Mr. Twain's hotel last night.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但昨晚有人看见一个喝得酩酊大醉的人走进了吐温先生的旅馆。

examination_example.sentence: He was often too <highlight>drunk</highlight> to attend meetings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他经常喝的酩酊大醉，以至于无法参加会议。

word_usage.usage: drunk的基本意思是“喝醉的”，可引申指为美好的事物而“陶醉”。
